backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user accounts, auth checks, and transfers with autogenerated IDs and in-memory account map.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summaries describing major frontend files and their roles.
frontend/.env.development.example: Development env template configuring backend mode and optional REST URL.
frontend/.env.example: Default env template specifying backend mode and REST base URL.
frontend/.env.staging.example: Staging env template forcing REST mode with staging backend URL.
frontend/.vscode/extensions.json: VS Code extension recommendations for frontend development.
frontend/.vscode/tasks.json: VS Code tasks for installing, running, building frontend and deploying backend.
frontend/admin-portal/.env.example: Environment template for admin portal backend mode and URLs.
frontend/admin-portal/index.html: HTML entry point mounting admin portal root element.
frontend/admin-portal/README.md: Admin portal overview, features, setup steps, and environment details.
frontend/admin-portal/src/AdminApp.tsx: Sets up the admin portal root with routing, theming, authentication provider, and layout shell.
frontend/admin-portal/src/backend/adminB: Provides a placeholder backend client for admin operations with mode and URL configuration.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/aut: Protects routes by checking admin authentication and role, redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/lay: Renders the admin portal header with navigation, theme toggle, and authenticated admin menu.
Layout wrapper providing header, content container, and footer for admin pages.
frontend/admin-portal/src/config/env.ts: Loads and validates admin-specific environment variables for backend mode and configuration.
frontend/admin-portal/src/contexts/Admin: Implements localStorage-based admin authentication with signup, login, logout, and session persistence.
frontend/admin-portal/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the admin portal by rendering AdminApp into the admin-root DOM element.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AccessDe: Displays an access-denied message with navigation back to the login page.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminDas: Shows the admin dashboard with placeholder stats and an overview of upcoming admin features.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminFor: Provides a demo password reset form for admins with confirmation messaging.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminLog: Provides the admin login form with email/password authentication, handling redirects and error states.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminSig: Implements admin account creation with validation for name, email, and password fields.
frontend/admin-portal/src/styles/admin.c: Imports the global index.css stylesheet into the admin portal.
frontend/DELIVERY_PLAN_BATCHES.md: Detailed batch-based assembly plan for user and admin portal codebases.
frontend/docs/CHAT_EXPORT_FORMAT.md: Explains the required chat-based format for exporting full project code when the export feature is unavailable.
Provides steps for reconstructing the entire project locally from chat-delivered source files.
frontend/docs/GITHUB_ONBOARDING.md: Guides users through creating a GitHub repo and pushing the project code.
frontend/docs/LOCAL_DEVELOPMENT.md: Instructions for installing dependencies and running the user portal locally.
frontend/docs/VSCODE_SETUP.md: Describes how to configure VS Code for optimal development of the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the root div and bootstrapping the frontend app.
frontend/README.md: User portal README with overview and quick start instructions.
frontend/REST_BACKEND_CONTRACT.md: REST API contract outlining required endpoints and security expectations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, providers, and protected routes for the main app using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/backendClient/config.ts: Reads and validates backend mode and REST base URL from environment variables.
frontend/src/backendClient/icClient.ts: Implements the IC backend client using a Motoko actor, handling accounts, transactions, financial health, and mock market data.
frontend/src/backendClient/index.ts: Provides a factory that returns a cached IC or REST backend client based on configuration.
frontend/src/backendClient/restClient.ts: Implements the REST backend client with fetch-based API calls, auth headers, bigint handling, and error parsing.
frontend/src/backendClient/types.ts: Defines the BackendClient interface and backend config types for IC and REST modes.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Protects routes by redirecting unauthenticated users and showing a loading UI.
frontend/src/components/balance/BalanceA: Displays a balance with optional masking based on visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/balance/BalanceV: Provides a button to toggle balance visibility with eye icons.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GoldSi: Renders a card showing dummy gold and silver prices with selectors for city, karat, and weight.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/NewsCa: Displays mock financial news items in a scrollable card with a demo disclaimer.
Layout wrapper that renders header, footer, and responsive sidebar with mobile menu control based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Simple footer displaying logo, copyright text, and demo disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar with logo, theme toggle, account menu, and mobile menu trigger tied to auth state.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Navigation sidebar listing app routes with icons, mobile/desktop modes, and scroll controls.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Dialog for submitting money transfers with validation, balance checks, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: LocalStorage‑based demo auth system providing signup, login, logout, and session persistence.
frontend/src/contexts/BalanceVisibilityC: Context managing toggleable balance visibility persisted in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend account, user profile, and related data with retry logic and actor support.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Syncs user theme settings with backend preferences and provides a toggle that updates both frontend and backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color variables for light/dark themes, and glossy background effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the account overview with balance, financial health charts, and account identifier loading states.
frontend/src/pages/BeneficiariesPage.tsx: Manages CRUD operations for user beneficiaries using local storage with validation and UI dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Page for viewing a demo debit card, toggling card number visibility, and freezing/unfreezing card state with persisted storage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard showing greeting, balance, recent transactions, and related widgets like gold/silver rates and news.
frontend/src/pages/DepositsPage.tsx: Displays demo fixed and recurring deposit products and includes a simple FD maturity calculator.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Demo password reset page allowing users to submit an email and view confirmation messaging.
frontend/src/pages/GoldSilverRatesPage.t: Shows gold and silver rate information with an explanatory section on pricing and purity.
frontend/src/pages/InsurancePage.tsx: Lists demo insurance products with filtering and displays details like coverage, premiums, and features.
frontend/src/pages/LoansPage.tsx: Displays loan products and includes an EMI calculator with form inputs and computed results.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login form with authentication handling, error display, and redirects for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/MarketInsightsPage.ts: Fetches and displays simulated market summary data with cards and a detailed table, including loading states.
frontend/src/pages/MutualFundsPage.tsx: Loads and shows mutual fund data in summary cards and a detailed table with simulated performance metrics.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Manages user notifications with filtering, read status updates, persistence, and categorized UI display.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Implements a demo bill‑payment form with category selection, validation, and simulated processing using toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Displays and updates user profile info with name editing, theme settings, and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsOffersPage.tsx: Shows categorized reward offers with save/unsave functionality stored per user and filtered by tabs.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Handles user signup with validation, KYC fields, account creation, and saving the profile before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/StatementsPage.tsx: Provides transaction history filtering, searching, exporting to CSV, and displays balance and statements.
frontend/src/pages/StocksPage.tsx: Displays simulated Indian stock data with loading skeletons, summary cards, and a full table view.
frontend/src/pages/SupportContactPage.ts: Provides a support center with ticket submission, ticket history stored locally, and help topics.
frontend/src/pages/TransferPage.tsx: Implements money transfer form with validation, balance checks, and transfer mutation handling.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for transactions, settings, market data, mutual funds, and stocks.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports transactions as a downloadable CSV file with formatted fields.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides INR currency formatting helpers for whole and decimal amounts.
frontend/src/utils/jsonBigint.ts: Adds JSON stringify/parse helpers to safely handle bigint values using string serialization.
frontend/src/utils/portalStorage.ts: Manages per-user localStorage data for beneficiaries, tickets, notifications, and other items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, persistence via sessionStorage, and cleanup utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and container settings, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state defining Phase 1 user portal updates, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for ongoing UI and functional changes.
